"Welcome to NTouch, the app that allows you to keep track of your interactions with those you care about most!"

Log in with Facebook

Keep track of the people closest to you

Life happens. We get it. But don't let life keep you from staying in touch with the people you care about most.

Import your best friends

Select your closest friends from facebook. We'll do the rest.

We'll remember for you

Tell us about things going on in your friend's lives.

Keep on living your life

Set it and forget it. You're a busy person, worry about the important stuff. We'll keep you posted.

Testimonials

  • I received a text reminder last week about my mother's birthday. Now I have a week to find a gift, which beats my usual method of having to find a gift the day of since I forgot.
    Rob Taksas, Unemployed
  • I moved to California last year for work and missed my best friend's birthday. I use NTouch to make sure that never happens again.
    Willis P. Jenkins, CTO
  • NTouch's automated text messages and emails removes any worry about forgetting important things happening to the people I care about.
    Lucas Luck, COO
  • Set it so you don't forget it. You won't regret it.
    Henry Wallace, Good Friend
